questions: What is the best title  of the passage ?
article:
In Germany , more than 70% of people like reading. They often read. They read in their homes. They read in libraries. They read in parks. They even read in hospitals. Parents often read books for kids .
It is easy to buy books in Germany. There are many bookshops in Germany. They are in big cities and small towns . A bookshop can sell  many books every day. Germans  also like to buy books on the Internet. More and more people buy books on the Internet.
In Germany, people often have reading parties. They are happy at the parties.
